resources:
Take Me Back Where I Came From
Hello blank fragment Take me back where I came from It is necessary that you grant the app all the required permissions. They are used only for the correct app work and your personal data will not be shared to anyone. This application is being developed for the fulfillment of the requirements of the MSc course in Advanced Software Engineering at the University of Sheffield. All rights reserved.> Developer: Aleksandr Sergeev> Supervisor: Prof. Fabio Ciravegna *Note: if the switch is off, the application will be working in manual mode and you have to manually save the location by clicking "SAVE CURRENT LOCATION" button in the Map Fragment. https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/place/nearbysearch/json?
